objects.text:
• Creates Biggest, Brightest Bubbles
• Eco-Friendly & Non-Toxic
• Won't Stain Clothes or Furniture

product_details.description: This top secret “super solution” has been formulated to create the biggest, brightest, most colorful bubbles on earth! You’ll be ready for hours and hours of fun with your favorite gazillion products with this oversized solution refill bottle. This premium solution is eco-friendly, safe, non-toxic, and will not stain clothing or furniture. With Gazillion Bubbles, you’ll run out of breath before you run out of bubbles! Great Bubbles for Kids.  Appropriate for ages 3 years and up. Multi-color.

banner_details:
This banner features a vibrant and playful layout, ideal for promoting a children's product. The left half of the canvas is filled with a dynamic purple-to-violet gradient and scattered glossy bubble graphics, creating an energetic visual texture. Centered on this section are text elements: a bold heading (`heading`) in a soft white, a bright yellow tagline (`tagline`), and a three-line description (`description`) in smaller white lettering. Below this is a neon green price text (`price`) for emphasis, followed by a green call-to-action button (`cta_button`) with white "SHOP NOW" text (`cta`). The right half of the canvas contains a high-resolution image of the product (`product_image`) set against a soft, light blue background, divided by a dashed vertical divider. The overall design is clean yet fun, evoking an engaging and trustworthy brand identity.

**Color Palette:**
- Gradient Purple: #8A2BE2 → #6A5ACD
- Accent Yellow: #FFFF00
- Electric Green: #7FFF00, #32CD32
- Soft White: #FFFFFF
- Sky Blue: #F0F8FF
- Divider Purple: #9370DB
product_color: The product image of "Gazillion Bubbles" uses a vibrant and playful color palette that captures a fun and energetic vibe. Dominant colors include neon green (#90EE90) for the liquid, paired with a deep purple (#8B3FCF) label, giving strong contrast. The logo uses a playful blend of lime green (#C7EA46), yellow (#FFD700), orange (#FF8C00), and blue (#4169E1). These bright shades are harmoniously balanced, each color outlined with complementary tones to ensure visibility and contrast. The bubble graphics subtly incorporate lavender (#D8BFD8) and light blue (#ADD8E6) to add whimsy and dimension, making an advertisement colorful, eye-catching, and lively.
